command.description: A command the bot can perform.

man.description: Show usage information for command. Type 'man' to see all commands

prefix.description:
Change prefix for commands.
'reset' to set default prefix.

poll.description: Create 'yes/no' poll. React with üëç for yes and üëé for no.
poll.examples: poll Am I the best bot?

role.description: Add/remove role to a person or everyone in the same voice channel
role.role_should_be_lower: Your (and bot's) highest role should be higher than "{{- role}}"
role.you_are_not_in_voice_channel: You are not in a voice channel.

likerole.description: Allow to set/remove role by reacting on a "role message".
likerole.examples: likerole @somerole With this role you will be awesome!

likeroles.description: Allow to set/remove roles by reacting on a "role message".
likeroles.examples:
likeroles create 
üëç @somerole With this role you will be awesome! 
ü§° @somerole With this role you will not be awesome!

dynvoice.description:
Create voice-channel factory to automatically balance existing voice channels. Managed channels inherit factory permissions.
Parameters:
* [parent id] - ID of a channel group to add
* [limit] - Limit of persons in the managed voice channel (0 - unlimited)
* [template] - Name of the managed voice channel
 - <user> is replaced by username
 - <game> is replaced by game in the status at the moment of creation
dynvoice.factory_created: Factory-Channel [{{- name}}] was created in the [{{- parent}}]

purge.description: Delete last messages from channel. Can be filtered by user.
purge.limit_exceeded_or_not_number: Exceed limit of handling messages ({{max}}) or not a number.

sentry.description: Observes current channel and sets emoji for every message if they are written by a single person in a sequence. If a person blocked the bot - deletes last two messages and rewrite them into one.
sentry.off: No law in this wild channel anymore!

pause.description: Pause handling all events but commands.

permissions.bot_requires_core_permissions: Bot doesn't have required core permissions in channel [#{{channel}}] on server [{{server}}].
permissions.user_requires_permissions: You don't have required permissions in channel [#{{channel}}] on server [{{server}}].
permissions.VIEW_CHANNEL: Read Text Channels & See Voice Channels
